topic.title: The Jewish Question is also the American Question
topic.body:
I've recently moved to Israel for work and I've learned a lot during my stay. The people here and the majority of other countries actually have a strong bond between themselves and their country, they do not devote their energy to blind patriotism, but rather nationalism. People do not associate themselves with their government or align themselves with politicians the same way we do, they do however associate their character with their own culture, language, and their own stock. Why is it that everyone else, even Israelis have this but we don't back at home? Why do we not know the difference between patriotism and nationalism? Culture and government aren't mutually exclusive, yet we treat it as if it’s the same thing, we categorize and hate whole groups of people and their culture for what their politicians are doing, not based off their real identity and how they are as people. We’re so out of touch we no longer live by the set of rules that define us as Americans, instead we praise incapable men as being the forefront of our nation to such a large degree we may as well believe they are America in the flesh.
 We talk a lot of shit about every country that isn’t the United States, this includes: Australia, New Zealand, Norway, and Denmark. When in reality these countries have everything we’re missing in the U.S - culture that isn’t degraded to the same level as here, people that still have direct ancestral links to the original inhabitants or colonial settlers, places with actual heritage intact, and a higher standard of living. We know we don't have true control or influence in the government and we would in fact be worse off if it weren’t for our constitution, so why do we do this? I've traveled to many countries and I can honestly say I feel more at home in any of them more than in America. I feel like there's something to live for and to show pride in instead of materialistic possessions and money, if I knew this earlier on I would’ve left long ago and migrated to one of these countries. Like many of us however I feel held back, abandoning the U.S to me in some ways is a cowardice act and I know I can’t assimilate or fit in anywhere else. The foundation of this country can’t be matched, the issue is what was added thereafter. If we cleansed the degeneracy and took inspiration from the Australians culturally with their macho way of being we would still have strong and pure men like they do. The truth is though we will never achieve that since our whole genepool has become a mongrelized mess, we used to be Anglo and proud, now we’re so mixed we just call ourselves (((Americans))).

Every passing day there are small events that go on in America which strips us of our freedom, the clock is ticking, soon we will have nothing and we won’t even realize what we’ve lost, the destruction of this country is heading down in a smooth, steady motion. If you’re smart enough to point out the faults you are seen as a madman or traitor of some sorts, even to people in your own general political alignment. And to the blinded people out there, let me tell you the harsh truth of it all: Americans are an army of rootless people, none of which does the nation belong to any particular race or group. They are perfectly interchangeable cogs with no hope of ever obtaining higher platitudes, they do not have character, strength, or courage to continue their conquest as a nation, as a people. They're nothing more than disposable human meat shields for their pseudo-Jewish government - a permanent underclass of gentiles lost and stranded in the sea of hopelessness. This nation is a soulless husk, all that remains now is a machine with no culture, no identity. Maybe there was an American identity at some point, but it’s totally gone now. There is no connection or bond as a white race anymore, our youth is lost to the negroes and Hispanics.
Also, what happened to our many great accents and every other strong accent around the world? We're not just seeing white numbers dwindle but we're seeing many accents across the world and especially in all of our states combine into this one big mess which is known as the general American accent. The many Americans with accents have a sense of character and seem more down to earth and humble, when I hear an American without an accent of some sort I just hear the mindless shit and lard gargle out of their mouths as if they've been chewing down on foreskins and hamburgers for their whole lives. It's like people are becoming Jew minded, morphing into this crazy fucked up mess with no return of being human again. We’re all one and the same - one culture, one voice, one lot of people. Maybe it’s the continuous movement of labor that makes our accents diluted and obsolete with the consumerist society we have. If a person does not prize consumerism above everything else, he will stay in his community and strive to build something there instead of becoming an economic mercenary. We’re literally getting Jewed out of our own accents.
The first step to fixing America is to acknowledge these problems at the very least so we can prevent them in the future if we ever reset. Are you willing to stay in America and recreate the culture we’ve lost or will you flee to another country with hopes of assimilating and being accepted there?

topic.title: Japan is the worst example of an ethnostate
topic.body:
Name a single people more depraved and degenerate than the japanese. pornography is rampant. pedophilia is normalized. japanese women have almost no children. japan is a dying society. the fact that so many /pol/tards idolize japan as an ideal ethnostate is baffling to me.

dont even get me started on japanese actions during the second world war. not only did japanese commit mass rape and genocide against chinese and koreans but they also used allied prisoners of war as living targets for bayonet and rifle drills. they even cannibalized POWs. unironically they deny these war crimes.

even italians are more honorable than backstabbing japanese. italy declared war against the soviet union in solidarity with their german allies. japan gave the united states an excuse to join the war in europe while contributing nothing to the war against the soviets.

so much for japanese 'honor'.

topic.title: Black people aren't human
topic.body:
"There is only one race the human race, race is a social construct”, was construed pre-50s by a Jew, Boaz, adopted by UNESCO in the 50s, (read Culture of Critique), before the human genome was even sequenced. We know that Neanderthal, Denisovian, and Cro-Magnon admixture significantly contributed to what we know as race, and sub saharans have little to none of this ad mixture. Neanderthals and Cro Magnon, for example, were completely different hominid species like the lion and the tiger are completely different feline species; yet they could interbreed successfully with fertile offspring. No one is saying Neanderthal and Homo Sapien were the same species because that's fucking retarded. Wolves and coyotes also successfully interbreed and they are different species of the canine family. Coywolves. It happens in nature. Siamese fighting fish as well. There's a lot
It’s difficult to get good new information, because the vast majority of social scientists are liberal. In social science it is easier to not be objective. They are cautious of getting labeled racist, especially if they’ve got a book to sell.
If they do find something, say on genetics and intelligence, or that race isn’t a social construct because you can distinguish race by DNA and bone structure, they will throw in a few caveats to make them not seem racist. Then when you try to use the fact, liberals will point to the caveat, and discount the data, even though the data is significant.


the internet is the digital library of Alexandria; one of humanity's (white people that is) magnum opus. instead of spending 20 years using the digital library of Alexandria to jack off to porn you people should research scientific facts - black "people" aren't people!

inb4 "B-but there is more genetic diversity between dog breeds than amongst humans themselves and neither have subspecies!11!1"

Please provide some citations. It's a bit difficult to believe that the very young species of dogs that went through extreme selection could be more genetically diverse than humans. In fact, I'm pretty sure that dogs are more similar to even wolves than humans are to niggers. And saying that something "has no sub-species" as an argument is just a brainlet move, when the whole conversation is about why there should be sub-species. It's a question of definition, not one of physical truth.

topic.title: Yearly reminder that the American Revolution was a British civil war.
topic.body:
The founding fathers never stopped considering themselves British. Indeed, some (like Thomas Jefferson, the revolution's biggest ideologue) considered America more British than Britain itself. He believed the revolution was a consequence of the Anglo-Saxon's innate desire for liberty and thought Britain had been corrupted by the alien values of the Norman elite. In other words, America was simply the English reasserting themselves after centuries of domination from a foreign ruling class; it was a new English nation built on fundamentally English principles. This view was shared by many others, particularly Benjamin Franklin, who wrote at length his opposition to non-British migration into the US and would no doubt abhor what it's become today.

It's well-known to anyone who's studied the revolution that a major motivation for the colonists was their belief that their "rights as Englishmen" were under threat. The anti-British sentiment associated with the revolution today is modern propaganda built on ignorance and lies. Few at the time would ever have envisioned their country would become minority Anglo-Saxon, let alone minority white.

topic.title: Abos are still kinda cool though
topic.body:
>No written language. In over 40000 years. History is oral based, LITERALLY Chinese whispers.

>Art is kindergarten level fingerpainting or spitting on hands to create silhouette. Acclaimed dot painting style was introduced to abos by white guy in the 70's...
https://www.creativespirits.info/aboriginalculture/arts/are-dot-paintings-traditional-aboriginal-art
https://japingkaaboriginalart.com/articles/geoffrey-bardon-influence/

>food is hunter gatherer based - more based on scavenging than hunting. Scavenging facilitated by lighting bushfires which caused wholesale extinction of some species of prehistoric fauna. 
https://www.colorado.edu/today/2017/01/20/humans-not-climate-change-wiped-out-australian-megafauna

>"Bushcraft" is LITERALLY trying plants and insects and hoping they're not poisonous (see point about history)

>architecture and shelter extends to lean-tos built of branches. Claims of a Stonehenge type stone circle - LITERALLY a bunch of rocks on a plain.
http://www.abc.net.au/news/2016-10-12/aboriginal-astronomy-provides-clues-to-ancient-life/7925024

>weapons are a throwing stick and an upgrade is a bigger stick to help throw first stick further
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woomera_(spear-thrower)

>music is mono-tonal drone produced by blowing thru a naturally hollowed out branch and clapping two stick together, singing is mono-tonal chanting.

>No farming. No evolutionary steps from settling to farming to building settlements etc. Some claims of eel farming which was essentially using reed traps to catch eels in estuaries.
http://austhrutime.com/eel_harvesting.htm

>Nomadic hunter-gatherer lifestyle, no ability to settle and build on culture. In 40000 to 60000 yrs.

>Fossilised remains of Mungo Man thought to show predecessor to abos (possibly hunted to extinction), possibility to research more halted by local "Traditional Landowners" claiming it was muh sacred site. On land that had never had any claim beforehand.
http://www.australiangeographic.com.au/blogs/on-this-day/2013/02/on-this-day-mungo-man-fossil-found/
http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0047248499903056
>Mungo Man isn't Aboriginal (as if that matters at all)
Further research has refuted this, turns out the first study was using contaminated DNA since, you know, it was discovered in the 70s
http://www.pnas.org/content/113/25/6892
http://www.abc.net.au/news/science/2016-06-07/dna-confirms-aboriginal-people-as-the-first-australians/7481360

>abos try to date history further and further back, originally 20000 yrs old now almost 60000. And nothing very much to show for it...
https://theconversation.com/dna-reveals-a-new-history-of-the-first-australians-65344

>https://quadrant.org.au/opinion/bennelong-papers/2013/05/the-long-bloody-history-of-aboriginal-violence/
Paleopathologist Stephen Webb in 1995 published his analysis of 4500 individuals' bones from mainland Australia going back 50000 years. (Priceless bone collections at the time were being officially handed over to Aboriginal communities for re-burial, which stopped follow-up studies).Webb found highly disproportionate rates of injuries and fractures to women's skulls, with the injuries suggesting deliberate attack and often attacks from behind, perhaps in domestic squabbles. In the tropics, for example, female head-injury frequency was about 20-33%, versus 6.5-26% for males.
The most extreme results were on the south coast, from Swanport and Adelaide, with female cranial trauma rates as high as 40-44%
>20-44% of female aboriginals had their heads bashed in (usually from behind) before the british came

topic.body:

>Romans invented Christianity to convert Kikes with their go to conversion Method being killing every Christian they could find for 200 years straight in the most brutal way they could think of

Lets take a look into History.
Back at the time of Jesus there was no Judaism, but Yahwehism, based on the laws of the old Prophets and practiced by the Israelites (when they didnt fuck around with false gods), in Judeah mainly the branch of the Sadducees, Essenes and the Pharisee with only the Essens being direct descendents of Judah. The Pharisee disliked the elitist Sadducees and claimed to be for the common people and gained influence that way. Their practices are based on the oral law that they practiced which is basically religious pilpul to argue that you follow the law without ever doing so, and was written down couple hundred years later in the Tal Mud and became the base of the modern rabbinical/talmudic Judaism that we know today.
So the Pharisee (Edomitic converts LARPing as ethnic Judeans) became the modern kikes and were back then already denounced by Jesus as Hypocrites, a den of vipers and children of the devil.
Christianity however is an update to the old law and traditions, the continuation of it where as the kikes specifically make up shit to not follow it but claim to do so anyway and came later down the line.

These last are Jews by birth, and seem to have a greater affection for one another than the other sects have.

Esau originally had the birthright to take over the tribe as a first born. However after a day of work on the field he went inside and asked his brother for something to drink or eat, for which Jacob demanded Esaus birthright. Esau agreed, and thus got what he wanted and Jacob got the birthright from Esau. However after this Esau wanted it back, Jacob didnt want to return it, and thus Esau parted from his family, joined a canaanite tribe that became known as Amalek (the Israelites nemesis) to wage war on Jacob/Israel. On the reason behind the existence of evil and ultimately our purpose:
First we must define evil. Evil is whats wrong in Gods eyes. God gave us free will, and free will requires the abillity to choose wrong, or else we would not be able to choose at all. If choosing wrong is evil then there cant be free will without evil

God creates Humans in his image, and he loves every one of them that is and will be. Satan, being basically a spoiled Child doesnt like us getting our fathers attention and thus tries to show him how lowly we are by corrupting us. He does this by bringing the fruit of knowledge of good and evil to us, which while likely intended for us eventually, we werent ready to eat yet as we were basically little babies in adult bodies.
With the fruit now Eaten we had to learn of both, Good and Evil. We knew good from our father and from being in Eden, but what was missing is Evil.
The best way to learn is to experience, thus we have to experience evil to learn of it, and we couldnt have evil in Paradise thus were send out, possibly falling from a spiritual state of existence into this mortal and material state. This world is sandbox/a tutorial so to speak. A containment reality where we can fuck around without being able to fuck up cosmically. Here we are meant to experience Evil, and Satan trying to corrupt us still is doing so by unleashing every plague he has up his sleeve onto us that we may fall from faith while simultaniously subverting what good and evil is. God loving and trusting us lets this happen since its the best way to learn of evil for us in the first place, and because he knows we will still praise God after everything. This is essentially the story of Job on a global scale.

Basically we are meant to learn good choices, and what this good actually is
